title: LOL LAUNCHER DIMMED
body: my league launcher is dimmed and im unable to touch the launch button, i can touch the video links even though they are dimmed too. i stopped playing league for about a week and when i came back yesterday this happened. pls help i really want to play but i caaaaaaaaaaaaaant.

replies.body: I've seen a few reports of a dimmed launcher, and some players were able to workaround this.  For your specific issue, try relaunching the client under Windows 7 Compatibility, which can be found by right clicking the lol icon and selecting the compatibility tab.  Let me know if this helps you!
This did not help me, can I get some further assistance?

Bummer to hear, but thanks for the follow-up.  I recommend posting this at the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards to let the client devs know about this.  In the meantime, your best bet may be to return to the legacy client until then:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Thanks!

Just a question regarding your answer: Where am I supposed to return to?

 I've been trying to use the old client like always, the one that was in use 2 weeks ago (I had to delete the game 2 weeks ago and am trying to reinstall and play but running into this issue) Is there anything else I should try?

Returning to that older client doesn't require a reinstall or rollback.  Navigate to the location you installed League, likely **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

In this directory, or whichever directory you chose to install League of Legends, you should be able to find a client called **lol.launcher**.  

If the dimming is happening on the old patcher too, let the devs know at the mentioned boards as that would be an unusual issue then perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)to return to a fresh state.

Yes, this is happening on old patcher, I never tried out the new client because I had been absent from the game for 2 weeks. Will post to the other section. Really appreciate the answers, thanks for your time :)
I GOT IT GUYS!! i just touched the region button which seemed to undo the bugged beta announcement and finally popped it up.
Same here, can't click anything, I see game news and stuff but everything is covered black.
